subject: Fwd: Pharmacy bulletin
body:
Dear valued member!

More and more people are getting concerned with the problem of fake drugs sold on the Web. This letter is aimed at helping you choose a really reliable Internet drugstore.

If you prefer shopping for meds on the Internet, remember three basic tips on how to choose a reliable e-shop:1)      the pharmacy should be well-known (for example, USDrugs)2)      it should be licensed3)      the drugs offered should be generic

Hope that you take our advice seriously. Take care.

Please click here for more information.

With Best Regards,  Anne Spears
USDrugs B.V.
http://havipu.descensionyiw.com/?aiyacwcopkwx
